references.paper_title: Model-agnostic meta-learning for fast adaptation of deep networks
references.reason: This paper introduces the Model-Agnostic Meta-Learning (MAML) algorithm, the core meta-learning method used in the research.

references.paper_title: wav2vec 2.0: A framework for self-supervised learning of speech representations
references.reason: This paper introduces the Wav2Vec 2.0 model, one of the two crucial pre-trained audio models used for feature extraction in the study.

references.paper_title: Robust speech recognition via large-scale weak supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces the Whisper model, the other essential pre-trained audio model leveraged for feature extraction and comparison in the research.

references.paper_title: ADIMA: Abuse detection in multilingual audio
references.reason: This paper introduces the ADIMA dataset, the primary dataset utilized for evaluating the proposed cross-lingual audio abuse detection method.

references.paper_title: DeToxy: A large-scale multimodal dataset for toxicity classification in spoken utterances
references.reason: This paper introduces the DeToxy dataset, a significant related work that is a large-scale multi-modal dataset for audio toxicity detection.
